title: Mac League of legends problem
body:
I guys does any 1 know how to fix the unspecified error the only thing i can do is re download league wait for it to install and play league that way!

if you know how to fix this please tell me thanks 

-SirCoconutt

replies.body:
Sorry ignore my previous post (Now deleted) I just noticed you're on Mac OS, the logs will have to be obtained manually.

The locations for each log file that would be needed can be found [here](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs#mq5), please attach these logs the next time this issue occurs in an email to **oce-wrenchmen@googlegroups.com**
